pc_video_watched.name: user_id
pc_video_watched.description: Numerical user ID of a learner on the edX platform

pc_video_watched.name: course_id
pc_video_watched.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

pc_video_watched.name: n_unique_videos_watched
pc_video_watched.description: Number of unique videos watched by a learner

pc_video_watched.name: fract_total_videos_watched
pc_video_watched.description: The fraction of videos a learner has watched

pc_video_watched.name: certified
pc_video_watched.description: Whether or not the learner is verified

pc_video_watched.name: verified
pc_video_watched.description: Whether or not the learner is enrolled in verified mode

description: Table generated with SQL query file pc_video_watched.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the number of course videos with which the learner engaged.
